body: @jart If you do indeed have an internal build file that builds libjpeg-turbo within Bazel, then that would definitely be a preferable way to go. If you could either share that so I could fix this PR, or substitute your solution with a different commit, that would render this entire PR unnecessary. :) Please keep me posted!
